name: Circle Restoration
description: A ritual performed by experienced druids to heal corrupted natural sites or ley lines.

name: Wildshape Mentorship
description: One-on-one guidance for initiates learning to master wild shape transformations.

name: Reagent Foraging Commission
description: Hire a druid to locate rare herbs, fungi, or monster-based components.

name: Arcane Consulting
description: Hire a licensed guild mage to evaluate magical effects, enchantments, or unknown arcana.

name: Spellcasting Service
description: Hire a licensed guild mage to perform spells or rituals sanctioned by the guild.

name: Spell Copying License
description: Legal access to copy specific spells from the guild archive for personal use.

name: Mana Saturation Testing
description: Test locations, objects, or creatures for levels of ambient or latent magic.

name: Battlefield Triage Training
description: A crash course on fast magical healing and injury assessment in combat scenarios.

name: Restorative Detox
description: Deep cleanse rituals using magic and herbal remedies to remove toxins and diseases.

name: Post-Recovery Counseling
description: Emotional and mental wellness sessions following traumatic magical or physical injury.

name: Ancient Text Translation
description: Transcription and interpretation of rare, ancient, or forgotten languages.

name: Research Commission
description: Contract a scholar to investigate a topic, region, or phenomenon on your behalf.

name: Lecture Hall Rental
description: Access to a small guild hall space for public lectures, presentations, or study groups.

name: Ritual Sanctification Services
description: Blessings for structures, tools, or areas to prevent decay or spiritual corruption.

name: Arcane Apprenticeship Matching
description: The guild pairs prospective students with willing mages for formal training.
